summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 4.0°C), outside temperature (down 2.9°C), and inside temperature (down 1.7°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 19 miles), light levels (up 7506 lux), and cloud levels (up 136 m) when compared to today.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; the temperature will feel nicely warm and pleasant. Also, air moisture should feel ok and a light breeze will be noticeable. A few light raindrops may fall, occasional overcast conditions, and bright intervals likely. The weather will likely remain the same.
